name: Jaque a la Dama
description:
This little 2d narrative game isn't about 2 Kingdoms in a never ending war but the tales of the people living with the consequences of the system created to exploit them. 

In about 20 minutes of duration tries to show some of these stories, the propaganda, lies, pain and the cost of neglect. 

Hope you enjoy it!

Currently is only available in spanish. Sorry for the incovenience.
